Helmy Halim, nke a na-akpọkwa Hilmi Halim (1916 - 1971) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Egypt, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe. Ya na ọtụtụ ndị a ma ama dịka Omar Sharif, Ahmed Ramzy, Faten Hamama na Abdel Halim Hafez arụkọwo ọrụ.
N'afọ 1955, ọ chọpụtara Ahmed Ramzy ma mee ya ka ọ bụrụ Ramzy na Ayyamna al-Holwa
